eventParts.text: I know the vultures stealing the seeds was bad, but I’m still kinda glad I got to go on this quest. You know what I mean?
Yeah, I’m glad I got to meet you guys.
Heh, that too of course! But I was thinking more about… before this adventure, I was only ever neutral. I had never really experienced any other emotions.
Yeah, I was always confident before.

It’s strange, isn’t it? My family used to say non-neutral birds thought they were better than us for having emotions. But you guys are great! My family was wrong. There’s nothing wrong with having emotions!

eventConsequence.selectionText: You’re right, Terry! Emotions can be great, and I’m glad you’ve gotten to experience that!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah! When I get back I’ll tell my parents about our adventure and all the emotions I’ve experienced!

Terry gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Even though emotions are great, there’s nothing wrong with being neutral either. Your family might not be all wrong.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, I guess you’re right. Emotions are cool, but being neutral is alright as well.

Terry gains +2 caution!
